name: Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels
name_original: Our Journeys 2 ~ A Collection of Visual Novels
description:
A collection of four stories in various genres.

Hack the Core

Chiko must hack Marlie’s core to protect his town from terrorists!

Nuri Corruption

Nuri need YOUR help to escape the dark hotel.

Red or Blue?

Salieka is in love with Taralise. What her Cycle would be?

Ixelda/Shirina

Two short stories, about Dark Fairies and a evil witch.
